javadoc: Lightweight descriptor of a local Project storage location.

methods.name: <init>

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this project URL corresponds to a transient project
 (e.g., corresponds to remote Ghidra URL)
methods.name: isTransient
methods.comment:
Returns true if this project URL corresponds to a transient project
 (e.g., corresponds to remote Ghidra URL)

methods.javadoc:
Returns the URL associated with this local project.
 If this is a transient project, a remote repository URL will be returned.
methods.name: getURL
methods.comment:
Returns the URL associated with this local project.
 If this is a transient project, a remote repository URL will be returned.

methods.javadoc: Get the name of the project identified by this project info.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the name of the project identified by this project info.

methods.javadoc: Get the location of the project.
methods.name: getLocation
methods.comment: Get the location of the project.

methods.javadoc: Returns the file that indicates a Ghidra project.
methods.name: getMarkerFile
methods.comment: Returns the file that indicates a Ghidra project.

methods.javadoc:
Returns project lock file to prevent multiple accesses to the
 same project at once.
methods.name: getProjectLockFile
methods.comment:
Returns project lock file to prevent multiple accesses to the
 same project at once.

methods.javadoc: Returns the project directory file extension.
methods.name: getProjectDirExtension
methods.comment: Returns the project directory file extension.

methods.javadoc: Returns the file extension suitable for creating file filters for the file chooser.
methods.name: getProjectExtension
methods.comment: Returns the file extension suitable for creating file filters for the file chooser.

methods.name: isProjectDir
methods.comment: Returns whether the given file is a project directory.

return.comment: true if the file is a project directory

methods.javadoc: Returns true if project storage exists
methods.name: exists
methods.comment: Returns true if project storage exists

name: ProjectLocator
comment: Lightweight descriptor of a local Project storage location.
